abstract: Liberty Media’s Starz unit is no longer going to promote its Vongo Internet movie service. It found the offering was too hard to promote, especially because of the limited selection of films. Instead it will offer a version of the service with Verizon and other pay-TV operators.

lead_paragraph: UPDATED | 5/27 4:45 PM Mr. Southwick writes to say he speaks for Starz, not Liberty Media, its owner.

headline.main: Liberty Pulls Back from Vongo Internet Movie Service
